# userInfo

**Instance Property**

An opaque value for the point of interest.

## Declaration

```swift
var userInfo: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to attach a value that provides additional context for the point of interest. For example, you can attach a model object and reference it in your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPPointOfInterestTemplateDelegate/pointOfInterestTemplate(_:didSelectPointOfInterest:)] method when the user selects the point of interest.
title: userInfo
